main event: On February 10, 1969, an unidentified object was sighted in Dayton, Ohio, for approximately 65 minutes at about 9:45 PM.
interesting points: The object was described as round or elliptical and bright orange in color., It traveled from northwest to southeast at a steady pace., No sound was associated with the sighting., The atmospheric conditions during the observation were clear with no clouds or haze., Observers commented on the object gradually dimming before disappearing.
sighted object: bright orange round or elliptical object
witness description: A male observer, age 33, who reported the sighting as part of the questionnaire.
